title: Child shot in eastern New Orleans dies at hospital
content:
An 8-year-old girl who was shot in eastern New Orleans Tuesday morning (March 3) has died at the hospital, authorities said at 9:15 a.m. Her 25-year-old mother also was killed in the triple shooting that sent another woman to the hospital.
The names of the victims are being withheld pending notification of family members, authorities said. NOPD said the shooting happened in a house in the 14000 block of Duane Road. It was reported just before 1 a.m. Tuesday.
The mother was shot multiple times and was pronounced dead at the scene, NOPD said.
The 8-year-old girl was shot in the head and a 39-year-old woman was shot multiple times. Both of the injured victims were taken to the hospital for treatment. No information was available about the other woman's condition.
New Orleans police offered no suspect or motive for the carnage inside the home at 14535 Duane Road. Neighbors, however, said it appeared the slain woman was "trying to get away from something."
Read more about what neighbors had to say regarding the triple shooting.
